scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One album, titled New York & Brooklyn Bridge and Brooklyn City by the Wittemann Brothers, dated 1883. The album contains 35 black-and-white illustrations of Brooklyn scenes, located in Downtown Brooklyn, the Brooklyn Navy Yard (formally known as the New York Naval Shipyard), Brooklyn Heights, Williamsburg, and Prospect Park. Images in the collection show the Brooklyn Bridge, the East River, City Hall (now Borough Hall), churches, and monuments in Prospect Park.
